column3: Welcome to the Gold Saucer! If you're looking to exchange your ordinary old gil for shiny new MGP, then you've come to the right place. What do you say?
I'm sorry, but it seems you lack the necessary funds to conduct the transaction. Might I suggest checking your coinpurse for holes?
Oh ho! It would seem you're already carrying a sizable sum of MGP, dear customer. If you're looking for more, you'll have to earn it for yourself!
Use of the exchange service is restricted to patrons with less than 500 MGP in their possession.
Additional MGP may be won from the numerous events and attractions available in the Gold Saucer. May the Spinner smile upon you!
